# Arham Animal Ambulance — Complete Reference

> India's largest free animal ambulance network providing 24/7 emergency rescue, treatment, and rehabilitation for injured street animals across 40+ cities. Operated by Arham Yuva Seva Group (AYSG), a youth-driven non-profit inspired by Param Gurudev Shree Namramuni Maharaj Saheb. Brand name: "Always Care."

## About the Organization

Arham Animal Ambulance (branded "Always Care") is a free, 24/7 emergency animal rescue service operating across India. Founded under the vision of Rashtrasant Param Gurudev Shree Namramuni Maharaj Saheb, the organization is rooted in the Jain principle of Ahimsa (non-violence) and the belief that compassion for all living beings is the highest form of service.

The ambulance network is operated by Arham Yuva Seva Group (AYSG), a youth-driven non-profit that delivers on-ground seva (selfless service) across India, encompassing animal welfare, disaster relief, medical aid, education, and community support.

Key facts:
- 43+ fully-equipped ambulances with trained veterinarians and paravets
- 4 free animal clinics (Mumbai Ghatkopar, Mumbai Kandivali, Rajkot, Junagadh)
- 1 state-of-the-art animal hospital under construction
- 75+ veterinarians and paravets on ground
- 1.5 lakh+ (150,000+) animals rescued and treated in the last 3 years
- 100+ daily rescue cases treated
- 100% free care — no animal is turned away, no bill is ever presented
- 80G tax-exempt donations under Indian law
- Payments processed via Razorpay

## How the Ambulance Network Works

1. **Emergency Call**: Anyone can call the local ambulance helpline number (available 24/7) to report an injured or distressed animal
2. **Dispatch**: The nearest available ambulance with a trained vet or paravet is dispatched immediately
3. **On-Site First Aid**: The team provides free on-site emergency first aid and treatment
4. **Transport**: If needed, the animal is transported to the nearest Arham Animal Clinic for further care
5. **Treatment & Recovery**: The animal receives complete treatment — wound care, surgery, medication, post-operative rehabilitation — entirely free of charge
6. **Release or Shelter**: Once recovered, animals are released back to their area or placed in continued care if needed

## Three Pillars: Rescue, Treat, Rebuild

### Pillar 1: Rescue — Arham Animal Ambulance
43+ fully-equipped ambulances dispatched free of charge, 24/7, reaching injured street animals across 15+ cities within minutes of a single call. Each ambulance carries trained vets and paravets with medical supplies for on-site treatment.

### Pillar 2: Treat — Arham Animal Clinic
4 dedicated animal clinics providing ongoing veterinary care — from wound treatment to post-operative recovery — completely free. Clinics located in Mumbai (Ghatkopar, Kandivali), Rajkot, and Junagadh.

### Pillar 3: Rebuild — Arham Animal Hospital
A state-of-the-art animal hospital currently under construction, designed to deliver advanced surgical care, long-term rehabilitation, and set a new national standard for how India treats its most vulnerable lives.

- Rajkot: +91 7567075680
- Junagadh: Contact via ambulance helpline

## Arham Yuva Seva Group (AYSG)

The parent organization, Arham Yuva Seva Group, is a youth-driven non-profit with 55+ centers and 1500+ volunteers impacting over 1 million lives. AYSG initiatives include:
- Animal welfare (rescues, ambulances, clinics)
- Disaster relief
- Medical aid and dialysis support
- Cataract camps
- Education aid and book distribution
- 500,000 daily meals
- Autorickshaw ownership programs
- Blanket distribution and water station construction

## Website Features

### Homepage (alwayscare.org)
- Interactive Leaflet map showing live GPS positions of ambulances across India
- Ambulance and clinic finder searchable by city with click-to-call
- Real-time live rescue case feed (live data from API)
- Daily case count (treated today) updated in real-time
- Donation widget with monthly and one-time options
- Photo gallery showcasing rescue operations
- "Foundation of Care" section explaining the three pillars
- Vision section about Param Gurudev Shree Namramuni Maharaj Saheb
- Volunteer application form
- Community links (Instagram, WhatsApp)

### Live Impact Page (alwayscare.org/live-impact)
- Real-time database of 700+ rescue cases
- Search across 13+ fields (case ID, address, animal type, condition, treatment, etc.)
- Sort by most recent or oldest
- Detailed case modals with medical information, treatment details
- Masonry grid layout with progressive loading (30 cases per page)

## Pages

- [Home — Find Nearest Ambulance](https://alwayscare.org/): Interactive map with live GPS tracking, ambulance finder, live rescue feed, donation widget
- [Live Impact — Rescue Case Tracker](https://alwayscare.org/live-impact): Real-time database of 700+ rescue cases with search and filter
- [Privacy Policy](https://alwayscare.org/privacy-policy)
- [Terms & Conditions](https://alwayscare.org/terms-conditions)
- [Refund & Cancellation](https://alwayscare.org/refund-cancellation)
